Title: Requires that gas and electric corporations provide in-person customer service representatives and maintain a publicly accessible outage and emergency tracking website
Summary: Requires that gas and electric corporations provide in-person customer service representatives and maintain a publicly accessible outage and emergency tracking website.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to requiring gas and electric corporations provide in-person customer service representatives and maintain a publicly accessible outage and emergency tracking website
